translated: The Chapter with Tamāla-Flower Elder’s Birth Story
My mansion was like the king of Devas’,
I offered it to the Buddha,
to the one who is the friend of the world.
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I was the only one called Candatitta,
the six supernormal knowledges were realized,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā tamālapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā tamālapupphiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: the Buddha’s instruction was fulfilled.”🔽Thus has it been said, and in this way it was said by the Elder Tamāla-Flower.
The Elder Tamāla-Flower’s Birth Story is the first.
